website_summaries.verdict: You don't need Drop to make good chocolate chip cookies, but it definitely helps ensure that your recipe ends up the same every time.
pros: The Drop scale and related iOS app rely on Bluetooth 4.0 to make baking an interactive smart home activity
cons: There's no Android app, and you can't add in your own recipes or tweak existing ones

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is a great combination of tech and foodie that I find difficult to resist. Setup was seamless and took less than a minute. I’ve only used it once so far, but that’s enough to get a gauge on its performance. I selected a simple cookie recipe with few ingredients and followed the directions, pouring ingredients into the bowl until the correct weight registered on the scale. I had to giggle the first couple of times the big checkbox popped up, letting me know that I’d poured in just the right amount of sugar or cocoa (because I’m a geek). I do plan to try adding some of my own recipes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gadget
customer_reviews.text: My family was in the market for a new food scale and we were intrigued by the Drop concept. As a food scale the device works as expected, we just wished there was some kind of display on the scale versus having to be dependent on a smart phone or tablet to see measurements. We were surprised at how well the scale works in conjunction with the recipes provided in the app. We really enjoyed making pizza dough from scratch. We also have enjoyed trying the different recipes and wish there were more! Drop recently started allowing people to submit their own recipes so we are hoping more recipes will continue to flow.
customer_reviews.author: sparkmonkie

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Will not turn on. Price has dropped from $99 to $44. The word must be out.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: Dissapoinment!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to Singapore. It's not working!! Try to replace the battery still not working!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Jusak

customer_reviews.title: Love This Scale and Recipe App!
customer_reviews.text: The Drop Non-Slip Silicone Connected Kitchen Scale and Interactive Recipe App is an awesome combo and I love it! Historically, I have not done a lot of the cooking for our family. In the year since I got my Drop Scale, I’ve been in the kitchen way more! I love the step-by-step instruction and really appreciate the interactivity of the Recipe app. It adds a whole new dimension to cooking and makes experimenting more accessible and fun. I love the community aspect of Drop Kitchen and study the recipe ratings to glean any wisdom for cooks far wiser than I. Well done, Drop Kitchen, and keep those recipes coming!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: in order to use this product it is necessary to use the reader. which makes the whole operation cumbersome. do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: eggneg

customer_reviews.title: Your bad
customer_reviews.text: It took forever it get here. The light did not come on, and I have had no response to me email. Because it took so long the return time has run out. Expensive experience
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Peachblossom

customer_reviews.title: An amazingly cool product!
customer_reviews.text: The Drop Scale is an amazing product! I've made a dozen recipes using my Drop since buying it on a whim after reading an article and I love it. Setup and connectivity are simple. The scale and app work perfectly together and the recipes are excellent. I'm not sure exactly why, but the combination of the scale, the app and the Drop community makes me want to cook, makes me enjoy the process even! I highly recommend this product to those who enjoy cooking and those who enjoy the latest tech. If you happen to be both, like me, you will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't even connect to my smartphone! But without smartphone it is absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey Ilinykh

customer_reviews.title: it is now very easy to cook
customer_reviews.text: my wife and I love this product. especially these days when both of us are working from home. its kind of fun having some time to go to the kitchen and observe how simple recipe is turning out to be yummy staff. The product is well built and high quality. no complains at all .. Thanks and stay safe ..
customer_reviews.author: MOHANAD ELSAKKA

customer_reviews.title: Great IoT kitchen product
customer_reviews.text: Made the banana bread recipe and was literally the best I've ever made and tasted. The user interface is awesome and the step by step instructions made it really easy to follow. No need for measuring cups anymore! Have already bought more for gifts and the recipients all loved it. Hope they can keep adding recipes to the platform. The best part for my family is the scaling feature. If I only want to make enough for a certain amount of people the Drop app can automatically recalibrate all the ingredients. Looking forward to Drop's next products to help me in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connecting problem.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to connect the bluetooth with my Android phone, can't stay connect. With output connect to bluetooth , this scale is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hung

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Drop scale, it is easy to use and perfect for portion control!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Francis

customer_reviews.title: Defective Piece
customer_reviews.text: The box was not sealed, the battery strip was not inserted and the device did not turn on, not sure if the battery had finished or not
customer_reviews.author: samir mabruk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for someone who loves to cook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom and she loves it! Perfect gift for someone who loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: K.Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for bakers
customer_reviews.text: I love it! We use it all the time for baking!
customer_reviews.author: Brendaddy

customer_reviews.title: I'm making scratch bread from recipes that actually taste like bread. It's FUN & the weight method saves ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I'm making scratch bread from recipes that actually taste like bread. It's FUN & the weight method saves dirtying lots of bowls and measuring instruments. It tares (zero's out) a heavy kitchenaid pro 600 bowl & all ingredients go into a single bowl Download the free app & look at avail by weight recipes
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The Time for the DROP Kitchen Scale has NOT Arrived.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of things everyone should know. This devices does NOT work with Android devices, yet. It works with SOME iPad devices, not the iPad GEN 1 or 2. There is also a limited number of recipes on the devices. The website lists 'hundreds' but in reality many are drinks and recipes other than dinner. When you isolate your search for 'dinner' recipes, there's a grand total of 23. If I knew this, I would not have spent the $100 for this device. They've obviously still got a lot of work to do to get this to a point where it's really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Diceman

customer_reviews.title: it works well and is great theoretically, but in practice it is hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: it works well and is great theoretically, but in practice it is hard to guess the amount of the additional ingredient to add after the first ingredient and if you go over it it is hard to remove since it is already in the mix.
customer_reviews.author: Cosnomate

customer_reviews.title: Really cool but still getting used to it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Christmas and it has been quite fun to use. The scale is very accurate, but it's hard trying not to use measuring utensils (trying to break old habits). The recipes we have tried so far have been very tasty, and we are anxiously waiting for the ability to add our own recipes. The scale has gotten our 16-year old daughter more interested in trying out new baking ideas. This could be a huge teaching aid for getting the younger kids on board, but its still good they learn their basic cup and tsp. measurements. Overall we have been very impressed how it works but are limited by the number of recipes available.
customer_reviews.author: Foster Mom

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a bad unit?
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't give it a 1 star as it seems to have promise. Product does not work. Period. It will be returned. If it can be replaced we will see. The problem is with the software right now. It does not function in scale mode or recipe. When placing a container on the scale and trying to "zero it out" to begin measuring ingredients, it consistently tries to re-zero. It is useless. Will not measure a simple single ingredient. Will not process multiple ingredients for a recipe. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew, that by using this scale, that you could make perfectly flavored margarita?? I do now! I bought this as a gift, and really wasn't sure about how well it would work. However after downloading the app, we have been able to make many dishes that we had never tried before. This product works very well, is very well made, and is getting much more use than I thought it went when I first purchased it. If you are a gadget guy like I am, and need to buy a gift for someone you care about, then this is it.
customer_reviews.author: TerryK

customer_reviews.title: The tech savvy cooks answer
customer_reviews.text: Do you like to make your life easier... ever struggle with changing a recipe or trying to dig through your cabinets to get the right measuring cup.. what if you could just pour the ingredients and your scale told you when to stop.. well now you have the answer! This scale will do all that, meaning you can clean out those cabinets and easily just store this small light weight scale and it will assist with all your cooking needs
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Simple and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and scale recipes up or down. The app also has easy substitutions if you don't like something or have an allergy. The biggest drawbacks for me are that you can't just use it as a scale and you can not add you own recipes, however they have said they are working on adding these features.
customer_reviews.author: S. Aron

customer_reviews.title: ... dead but the company replaced it very quicky and easily and it works great
customer_reviews.text: battery arrived dead but the company replaced it very quicky and easily and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Henry

customer_reviews.title: Novel Scale with App
customer_reviews.text: Seems accurate, and was easy to sync with iPad. Entering a new recipe with the beta program took a while but worked, although it resizes everything in ounces or grams, not teaspoons or cups.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised! Looking forward to being able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised! Looking forward to being able to use my own recipes with this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Android issues
customer_reviews.text: The connection to the Android phone is unstable and the scale is useless without a device.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Terne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Price aprehension? Drop kitchen scale for iPad A good investment. Garth.... That was a haiku
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: included battery fail
customer_reviews.text: Dead battery presumably. As it is sold by Amazon.com LLC, there is no choice for feedback on this item, only 3rd party sellers, the item is not listed at amazon.com/feedback for resolution, the only option is to review -- I was able to connect to it only ONCE, assuming included battery has failed :(
customer_reviews.author: funnel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome. It's Bluetooth capable and syncs to your iPad or iPhone and through the app takes you step by step through recipes. The app itself is pretty outstanding as well capable of adjusting ingredients to increase or decrease the serving amounts on all recipes. Want to cook a recipe that calls for three avocados, but you only have one...well it can correct the rest of your ingredients for that too. I see myself giving this as a xmas gift for a few people in my family. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Underwater Attack Cat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product that anyone has ever come up with. This past Christmas I had my two grandkids over to bake and they chose the gingerbread cookies. They had a blast measuring the ingredients till it hit the line. Their ages are 7 & 8 and they can read directions and wants to do it again. And I much say that the recipe got the best reviews from my co workers when I brought them to work. They said they were so moist and delicious. I would recommend this to anyone that likes to bake. I am looking forward to being able to down load my own recipes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a good electronic scale, but its real value is in the app that integrates recipes, allows for substitutions, etc. I've followed several of the recipes and yielded good results. I have only a few quibbles: First, the scale isn't perfectly sensitive to slight changes in weight. It seems to move in larger increments than what one might like. Second, the recipe app doesn't allow for adjustment of ingredients on the fly. I need to adjust for ingredients at the beginning if I don't have enough of something. Third, there aren't as many recipes in the ecosystem as one might like, but I hope that that will be rectified as more people start using it.
customer_reviews.author: BearlyUsed

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Every recipe I've tried has turned out ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Every recipe I've tried has turned out fabulous. It's fun to use, has a great selection of recipes with more being added all the time. It's easy to use and recipe quantities can be easily adjusted. Great illustrations and tips for all sorts of baking, salads, bbq, and much more. You can download the app for free and check out recipes. But you'll want the scale too.
customer_reviews.author: Chilemama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome daily-usable kitchen tech
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these as a gift for Christmas, and I've used it at least once a week since! Yes, it's a bit inconvenient if you just want a simple scale, but all of the other features make up for it. The companion app is beautifully designed and stocked-full of great recipes. If you like cooking, I would definitely recommend you getting one of these for your kitchen! If there were to be another new version, I would just recommend that the developers install a small screen on the physical unit so that you don't need to open the app if you need to make a quick measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Brown

customer_reviews.title: In my humble opinion - it is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my son-in-law who is a master chef and has his own recipes for the #2 rated hot sauces in America, Paulmanacre.com. I spent all day experimenting with it and will buy one for myself and my wife. It is fantastic. Easy to use, innovative and accurate. I love how you can add ingredients and continue to zero the scale for the next ingredient. It is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It's always fun and so easy to cook and bake using the recipes on the app. The app itself has awesome recipes (the hamburger,wow!) And then to use is as a regular digital scale is great too! Clean and simple user interface. The size of the scale is small and fits anywhere and that's always a plus in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: SuzyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this out of curiosity,It looked fun and having not had too much joy with previous baking endeavors I figured it would be worth a try. I used it recently when my friends came over to visit and it was a success. Definitely worth having in any kitchen. It provided a fun and easy cooking experience and most importantly my baked goods turned out better than expected. Baking was fun and fool proof. From zero to hero in the kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: The perfect scale for the perfect meal
customer_reviews.text: The fastest way to cook without having my Thermomix to weigh things. I'm so happy I found this electronic scale. Super easy to use, perfect size landing pad, and easy to clean. The app makes it super simple to make some fantastic recipes. Definitely on my gift lift for close friends!
customer_reviews.author: R. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and so convenient for anyone who cooks or bakes frequently! I recently had an issue with the battery and the company organized a return quickly and efficiently, providing excellent customer service along the way. Highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Arrived With Dead Battery
customer_reviews.text: The scale was easy to set up and get going with both my iPhone and iPad. Unfortunately it arrived with a dead battery and I had to replace it before it would work. The particular battery it uses( cr2477) is not available anywhere locally but at a battery store. The unit arrived without the protective tab installed on the battery compartment. Poor quality control. The scale worked and did what it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Cooking make easy.
customer_reviews.text: My idea of cooking in the past was boiling a pot of water and throwing in some pasta. The Drop scale has changed that. Makes cooking from scratch super simple. One of my better purchases.
customer_reviews.author: DonZ

customer_reviews.title: Great scale!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitchen gadget. It's easy to use, sync the scale up with the Drop app and go. While there are cheaper scales, the Drop recipe library integration is really nice. I hadn't realized how much easier it was to measure by weight than by volume until I tried one of the Drop recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gaul

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design and Holds iPad/iPhone nicely while cooking /prepping meal
customer_reviews.text: Great iPad accessory, love the red because it matches my kitchen, very durable little scale! I love the slot where the iPad or iPhone can rest right in so you can view recipes while you cook, very convenient! All in all, a very handy kitchen device to have on hand. Easy to clean, the weight is right on it and not overly sensitive and this is a good upgrade to our old kitchen scale.
customer_reviews.author: JDuB

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The Drop scale works perfectly. I've had it for over six months now, and I haven't had any problems. My favorite is the red velvet cupcakes and the cream cheese frosting. It measures out the ingredients to the point that you don't even need measuring cups. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The app installed and worked perfectly. Very accurate and the measurement conversion were right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool for the kitchen! Easy to use and friendly app with tons of recipes. Great to use with kids to introduce them to the world of baking. Bravo DROP SCALE!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wise

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy to use and the recipes are super good
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly easy to use and the recipes are super good. Recommend to everyone, even kitchen novices. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Schock

customer_reviews.title: My family loved the two cakes I made
customer_reviews.text: I used drop for the first time last week. My family loved the two cakes I made. Drop is so easy to use I love it
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced cookbook!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this scale.... Until I realized that it is just a $100 cookbook. You cannot use this with your own recipes. It is ONLY for use with the recipes in the drop app. You can't save your own, so, unless you need a $100 interactive cookbook, the current version of this item is useless!!
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work without a phone, and when the app doesn't work, neither does the scale.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple years. Biggest issue is you need to use their app. Which means you need to have your phone with you every time you want to measure something. Also, you are required to make an account. Which is all fine and dandy until you need measure something and for some reason the app needs you to re-login and you don't remember what your credentials were. Dear Drop, make the app work WITHOUT LOGGING IN! Being able to measure multiple items, like in a cake mix, might be a nice perk, but I've never actually used it for that. I just need a kitchen scale to weight things quickly, something this doesn't do.
customer_reviews.author: peazley

customer_reviews.title: Drop it like its hot!!
customer_reviews.text: The drop scale is amazing and so easy to use! The sleek and compact scale fits anywhere in the kitchen and the app is so user-friendly! The scale is very easy to clean I mean I love it! We made hot chocolate kit mason jar mixes for Christmas gifts with it and they came out perfect each time because the measurements were so precise. The scale was sensitive enough to get a measurement precisely down. I like using one container for some recipes as it is better than having to clean multiple measuring cups! The only thing I would say is keep adding more recipes to the app because I love experimenting!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Overpriced Bluetooth scale. much better options out there. Oz. Or kg only. Cannot turn it off always on = battery destroyer. Lithium batteries are spendy.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works great as just a scale and the recipes are off the charts delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift at the holidays. I love this product. The app is beautiful and the device is very well made and small, so it is easy to store or even leave on the counter, as I do. The recipes are fantastic. I have made several pies, cookies, tarts to the delight of my family. I also use a lot to just weigh things with my iPhone and look forward to the release of an iPhone app so I don't always have to get my iPad out to make something. I also like that they have added recipes beyond just baked good and that there are a lot of gluten free and savory options!
customer_reviews.author: maudedog

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is unique and fantastic. Use it for drinks, food, and anything else you need precisely measured. It makes cooking and especially baking easy. Get your kids involved, it’s a great teaching tool. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this scale!
customer_reviews.text: I have the scale and I use it with my iPhone 6plus. (I hope they bring all the features available to the mobile as the IPad). It's wonderful, I had a few kinks to work out in the beginning. I was assisted by Anna and her customer service was PHENOMINAL! she worked patiently with me until the problem was corrected! I've used my scale for almost all my baking needs but my last one with my French Macarons turned out awesome! A great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cake pops

customer_reviews.title: GREAT kitchen must-have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little treasure I found! I find myself using it to weigh more than my recipe's ingredients. It seems each day brings new Drop recipes -- yay, bring them on!
customer_reviews.author: CyndiLou

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: As a chef I have seen so many scales but this one is way easier and lot more compact and it is full of great recipes and the knowledge of its administration and customersee makes it even better thank you
customer_reviews.author: Clark

product_meta.title: Drop Scale - Connected Kitchen Scale and Step-by-Step Recipe App
product_meta.description: Drop is a Bluetooth-enabled kitchen scale that intuitively guides you step-by-step through finding, making and sharing delicious dishes with the help of a connected iOS app. You'll be at the top of your cooking and baking game thanks to interactive recipes, simple ingredient substitutions and smart ingredient scaling
feature_bullets: Smart scaling-scale any recipe by ingredient
More single-bowl recipes mean less clean-up
Auto progress and wireless button mean no need to touch your device with dirty fingers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars119 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
